title: NSA collected 534 million phone records in 2017
text:
NSA collected 534 million phone records in 2017 1:28pm EDT - 01:29
The U.S. National Security Agency collected 534 million records of phone calls and text messages of Americans last year, more than triple gathered in 2016, a U.S. intelligence agency report released on Friday said. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The U.S. National Security Agency collected 534 million records of phone calls and text messages of Americans last year, more than triple gathered in 2016, a U.S. intelligence agency report released on Friday said.
